dstm2

Class Thread.ThreadState

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.Thread.ThreadState
  • Enclosing class:
    Thread

    public static class Thread.ThreadState
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds thread's actual state

      used for debugging
      boolean validate()

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets any metering information (commits/aborts, etc).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        used for debugging
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of thread state

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Can this transaction still commit? This method may be called at any time, not just at transaction end, so we do not clear the onValidateOnce table.
        Returns:
        true iff transaction might still commit

      • runBeginHandlers

        public void runBeginHandlers()
        Call methods registered to be called on transaction begin.

      • runCommitHandlers

        public void runCommitHandlers()
        Call methods registered to be called on commit.

      • beginTransaction

        public void beginTransaction()
        Starts a new transaction. Cannot nest transactions deeper than Thread.MAX_NESTING_DEPTH. The contention manager of the invoking thread is notified when a transaction is begun.

      • commitTransaction

        public boolean commitTransaction()
        Attempts to commit the current transaction of the invoking Thread. Always succeeds for nested transactions. The contention manager of the invoking thread is notified of the result. If the transaction does not commit because a TMObject opened for reading was invalidated, the contention manager is also notified of the inonValidate.
        Returns:
        whether commit succeeded.

      • abortTransaction

        public void abortTransaction()
        Aborts the current transaction of the invoking Thread. Does not end transaction, but ensures it will never commit.

      • runAbortHandlers

        public void runAbortHandlers()
        Call methods registered to be called on commit.
